name: Jumping Slime (Kikopu)
description:
Hi, and welcome !

Jumping Slime is a little platform in which you have to go through nine little levels.
Your slime cannot walk nor run, and is only able to jump. You have to charge each jump with more or less force to beat the game without dying ; the less jumps used in a level, the better gets your rank.

You only need a mouse to play, or a touchpad. To jump, press left click, and aim with the mouse !

This game has been made as a submission to the Godot Wild Jam #49. The given theme was Unstable, and I tried to validate the A Blast From the Pastel wild card. I tried to design a game centered around unstable platforms, but I couldn't develop one of the core mechanics I had in mind, so I do realize the theme isnt as central as it was gonna be, but I decided to keep working with what I had, as I found the game to be fun.

GWJ#49 has been extended for a week, but I don't know if I'll be able to work on the game during this extension ; so even though the game is online, it may be updated before the end of the jam.

Jumping Slime is the first game I fully made from scratch all by myself ! I am a designer more than a developer, and I'm not an artist, but I hope you still will be able to enjoy this. Everything present in this game is original resources I personnally made this week, except for the font, which is the Light Pixel-7, by Style-7.

Game Design / Development / Audio / Graphics : Eric LAMAISON
